title: Secure Authentication and Access Control
summary: Implement multi-factor authentication and role-based access to ensure secure customer access.
description: Develop a secure authentication framework enabling customers to log in using multi-factor authentication (MFA) methods such as SMS, email OTP, or authentication applications. Implement role-based access controls (RBAC) to restrict system access based on customer profiles and authorization levels. Data must be encrypted both in transit and at rest, complying with financial security standards. This EPIC ensures all user sessions are secure and auditable.

title: Responsive and Accessible Portal Interface
summary: Design a modern, intuitive, and responsive interface accessible across all device types.
description: Create a user-friendly self-service portal interface optimized for use on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. Ensure consistency in layout and user experience across platforms while complying with accessibility standards such as WCAG 2.1. The interface will focus on simplicity, speed, and clarity, minimizing required clicks and effort for key customer actions, such as account management and service requests.

title: Personalized Customer Dashboard
summary: Develop a personalized dashboard displaying relevant banking products and services.
description: Build a customer-centric dashboard that presents a personalized overview of available banking products, services, and account information based on user profiles and eligibility. Integrate real-time data retrieval from the bankâ€™s systems to display up-to-date balances, offers, and service availability. The dashboard will serve as the central hub for all user actions, notifications, and account insights.

title: Digital Account Opening and Service Modification
summary: Enable seamless online account opening and modification through guided workflows.
description: Implement digital workflows that allow customers to open new accounts or modify existing account services directly through the portal. The workflows should reduce manual input, rely on pre-filled data where applicable, and validate inputs in real-time. Ensure that backend processes interact securely with core banking systems for approvals and updates. This EPIC supports efficient customer onboarding and service management.

title: Application Draft and Document Management
summary: Allow saving incomplete applications and secure document uploads within the portal.
description: Develop functionality for customers to save partially completed applications and resume them later. Enable secure upload and storage of documents necessary for account opening or service changes. Ensure files are encrypted, scanned for potential threats, and appropriately linked to user submissions. This EPIC enhances customer convenience while maintaining compliance with security and data retention policies.

title: Real-Time Notifications and Status Tracking
summary: Provide customers with real-time updates and notifications on their submitted requests.
description: Develop a notification service that alerts customers via email and in-portal notifications about request status changes, approvals, and pending actions. Integrate a request tracking feature allowing users to view the real-time progress of their applications. Ensure communication is secure and provide an option for customers to customize their communication preferences for transparency and improved engagement.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Establish secure connectivity and data exchange between the portal and core banking systems.
description: Design and implement an integration layer that enables seamless communication between the self-service portal and the existing core banking system. Use APIs or middleware solutions to synchronize customer data, account statuses, and transactional updates in real-time. Maintain integrity and accuracy of shared data through validation mechanisms and ensure minimal latency during interactions.

title: Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Develop a dedicated database for the portal to ensure independence and high performance.
description: Set up an independent, scalable database supporting the self-service portal to minimize dependency on core banking resources. Optimize data storage, indexing, and caching strategies for fast load times and smooth user interactions. Implement real-time monitoring, database replication, and automated backup mechanisms to maintain consistent availability and performance under heavy user loads.

title: Comprehensive Interaction and Audit Logging
summary: Maintain a detailed history of all user interactions and transactions within the portal.
description: Implement a transparent audit trail capturing every user action, including logins, account requests, modifications, and notifications. Ensure records are immutable, timestamped, and securely stored for compliance with banking regulations and internal audit requirements. Provide users with access to a history view of their past activities while facilitating administrative oversight for compliance teams.
